alert.note: Alert for Uncompahgre Plateau, Dallas Divide (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued February 27 at 4:14PM MST until March 02 at 5:00AM MST by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM MST TUESDAY ABOVE 8000 FEET... ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY EVENING THROUGH LATE WEDNESDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory above 8000 feet, snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 5 to 10 inches. Winds gusting 60 to 70 mph Tuesday morning. For the Winter Storm Watch, heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 10 to 15 inches possible. Winds could gust as high as 35 to 45 mph on Wednesday. * WHERE...Uncompahgre Plateau and Dallas Divide. * WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, until 6 PM MST Tuesday. For the Winter Storm Watch, from Tuesday evening through late Wednesday night. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility, especially on ridge tops. A detailed map of the snowfall can be found at: www.weather.gov/gjt/winter.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
